abilities.description: Ambush: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.ed343c963b08f301]{Enter the Fray} +shadow with your tiger, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Hunter: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} by having your tiger attack from hiding while you distract your foe, you may roll +shadow (instead of +iron or +edge). If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Neck Snap: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.aac3783710ad7499]{End the Fight} by having your tiger attempt a death blow on a foe (formidable or less), you may reroll any dice.
